author: _shemnon
content:
I was getting formatting errors.  Switching to the raw url launched it for me: 
`kurtosis run github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package --args-file https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/main/.github/tests/eof.yaml`

author: barnabasbusa
content: ah indeed its supposed to be the raw url my bad

content: or you can use a local file of course

author: _shemnon
content: evmone-eofparse does not have a way to signal that the input is initcode.  Should `eof_test.py` be rewritten to do the testing via a fixture diretly, or should we figure out a way to signal initcode mode to the big-eof era validation fuzzer?

author: _shemnon
content: Could we infer it by the first use of EOFCREATE or RETURNCONTRACT?
